title: TechCon 2023
description: The ultimate conference for tech enthusiasts, featuring the latest in AI, VR, and software development.

interestAreas.description: Explore the latest advancements in AI and machine learning.
Dive into virtual worlds with hands-on demonstrations and talks.
Learn about new development trends and methodologies.
Get a sneak peek at upcoming games and gaming tech.
Pitch your ideas and meet potential investors.

title: GameFest 2023
description: A celebration of gaming culture, with tournaments, panels, and previews of new games.

interestAreas.description: Watch top players compete in popular titles.
Discover hidden gems from independent developers.
Workshops on game creation and design.
Exclusive merchandise from your favorite games.
